questions.text: What is the highest level of school you have completed or the highest degree you have received?
answers: High school graduate or GED (includes technical/vocational training that doesn’t towards college credit)
Some college (some community college, associate’s degree)
Some postgraduate or professional schooling, no postgraduate degree
Postgraduate or professional degree, including master’s, doctorate, medical or law degree
